caption.p: Average score values of apical stages of intact and bud‐removed male and female aspen plantlets during bud set. 2013 bud set (a) (both male and female average score values combined), 2014 bud set (b = intact, c = bud removed) (for intact and bud‐removed individuals, only the treatments having significant effects are included in the graphs along with control treatments and female comparisons in order to avoid the complexity in visualization). (black markers = significant treatments, gray lines = females, T, elevated temperature, UVA, Ultraviolet radiation‐A, UVB, Ultraviolet radiation‐B, UVA+T, Ultraviolet radiation‐A+ elevated temperature, UVB+T, Ultraviolet radiation‐B+ elevated temperature)
